issue.title: Revolute2 joints are mot working | gazebo9 | ubuntu18.04

content.raw:
OK, I decided to come back to Gazebo9.

Now after install when I run

a launch file requiring

the following plugins are not found

‌

* gazebo\_ros\_laser  
  gazebo\_ros\_joint\_robot\_state\_publisher  
  gazebo\_ros\_diff\_drive

Error

msg: \[Err\] \[Plugin.hh:178\] Failed to load plugin libgazebo\_ros\_laser.so: libgazebo\_ros\_laser.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

‌

now

Gazebo

version 9.12.0

:sob:
content.html:
OK, I decided to come back to Gazebo9.

Now after install when I run

a launch file requiring

the following plugins are not found

‌

  • gazebo_ros_laser
    gazebo_ros_joint_robot_state_publisher
    gazebo_ros_diff_drive

Error

msg: [Err] [Plugin.hh:178] Failed to load plugin libgazebo_ros_laser.so: libgazebo_ros_laser.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

now
